subject: French Open (Tennis)
Hockey, Ice
Golf
Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Paul Pierce on the bench when the game ends? Boston Bruins goalie Tim Thomas taking next year off? Tiger Woods winning? That qualifies as a surprise ending as well.
snippet: LeBron James and Paul Pierce on the bench when the game ends? Boston Bruins goalie Tim Thomas taking next year off? Tiger Woods winning? That qualifies as a surprise ending as well.
